group.name: process
group.item: Choose the type of process you want to create.

Define the entry and exit sockets by drag and drop from the toolbox. You can add parameters to the sockets by dragging them from the item browser and dropping them onto the socket the shall be added to. Use the property browser below to edit the properties of the selected node, socket or parameter.
